steps.description: Talk to Sea Wolf MacKinley, turn in Deliver to MacKinley, and accept Voodoo Dues
Talk to Crank Fizzlebub and accept Zanzil's Secret
Talk to Fleet Master Seahorn and accept The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Talk to Oglethorpe Obnoticus and turn in Rescue OOX-22/FE!
Travel to the Bloodsail Ships
Kill Captain Keelhaul, Fleet Master Firallon and Captain Stillwater.

tips.text: They are each found on a Bloodsail Ship, on the second floor
Search the bottom floor of each Bloodsail Ship for Cortello's Riddle. It can spawn on any of the ships
Use Cortello's Riddle to start the quest
Cast Eagle Eye to try and find which location it is in

steps.description: Travel to the Ruins of Aboraz
Kill Chucky Ten Thumbs. Loot him for his Huge Ring
Travel to the Ruins of Jubuwal
Kill Maury Club Foot Wilkins. Loot him for his Clubbed Foot
Kill Jon-Jon the Crow. Loot him for his Golden Spyglass
Kill the Zanzils. Loot them for their Mixtures
Kill Tethis. Loot him for his Talon

tips.text: Tethis will patrol around in this location

steps.description: Kill Bhag'thera. Loot him for the Fang of Bhag'thera

tips.text: Bhag'thera can spawn north or west of the Mosh'Ogg Ogre Mound
Cast Eagle Eye to try and locate Bhag'thera

steps.description: Talk to Sir S. J. Erlgadin and Hemet Nesingwary, turn in Panther Mastery and Raptor Mastery, and accept Big Game Hunter
Kill King Bangalash. Loot him for the Head of Bangalash.

tips.text: Use the Flash Bomb on King Bangalash when he is at 55%
King Bangalash will spawn 2 Panthers at 50% health. Try to CC him just before 50% if possible so it prevents him from spawning any
If you are not confident, skip this step

steps.description: Talk to Hemet Nesingwary and turn in Big Game Hunter
Abandon Big Game Hunter
Travel to Booty Bay
Talk to Sea Wolf MacKinley and turn in Voodoo Dues
Talk to Whiskey Slim and Crank Fizzlebub, accept Whiskey Slim's Lost Grog, turn in Zanzil's Secret, and accept Zanzil's Mixture and a Fool's Stout

quests.name: Zanzil's Mixture and a Fool's Stout

steps.description: Talk to Fleet Master Seahorn and turn in The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Talk to Viznik or Rickle. Withdraw from your bank: A Sycamore Branch (If you have it) and Sharpbeak's Feather
Abandon The Bloodsail Buccaneers
Talk to Gyll and fly to Westfall
Talk to Grimbooze Thunderbrew, turn in Sweet Amber, and accept Sweet Amber
Talk to Thor and fly to Stormwind
Talk to Gyll and fly to Stormwind
Teleport to Stormwind City
Talk to Jennea and train your class spells
Talk to Sheldras Moontree and train your class spells
Travel to the Stormwind Cathedral
Talk to Arthur the Faithful and train your class spells
Talk to Brother Joshua and train your class spells
Talk to Einris Brightspear and train your class spells
Talk to Wu or Ilsa and train your class spells
Talk to Osborne and train your class spells
Go into The Slaughtered Lamb and go downstairs
Talk to Ursula Deline and train your class spells
Talk to Spackle Thornberry. Buy Grimoires for your pets
Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon. Buy Gorilla Fang for a faster turn in at STV later.

tips.text: This will save you time as you won't need to run around looking for mobs to kill. Skip this step if you wish to not buy any
Remember to check your bank before you buy any as you may have found some earlier

steps.description: Talk to Auctioneer Jaxon. Buy Red Power Crystal, Green Power Crystal, Blue Power Crystal, and Yellow Power Crystal for a faster turn in at Un'Goro Crater later.

tips.text: This will save you time as you won't need to run around looking for them. Skip this step if you wish to not buy any

steps.description: Talk to Dungar Longdrink and fly to Darkshire
Talk to Watchmaster Sorigal and accept Supplies for Nethergarde
Talk to Felicia Maline and fly to Nethergarde Keep
Talk to Quartermaster Lungertz and turn in Supplies for Nethergarde
Talk to Thadius Grimshade atop the Tower and turn in Thadius Grimshade
Talk to Thadius Grimshade atop the Tower and accept Nekrum's Medallion
Travel to Swamp of Sorrows

tips.text: Be very careful of Stonard Scouts anytime you are in Swamp of Sorrows. If one ever attacks you, you will be PvP Flagged for 5 minutes

steps.description: Click A Soggy Scroll in the water under the bridge, turn in Cortello's Riddle, and accept Cortello's Riddle
Kill Jarquia. Loot him for his Balanced Flameberge.

tips.text: Jarquia has a few different spawn locations along the coast

steps.description: Hearth to Gadgetzan
Talk to Gimblethorn. Deposit Goodsteel's Balanced Flameberge into your bank
Talk to Gimblethorn. Withdraw Unhatched Sprite Darter Egg from your bank
Travel to the Mirage Raceway
Talk to Kravel Koalbeard, turn in Zanzil's Mixture and a Fool's Stout, and accept Get the Gnomes Drunk

quests.name: Zanzil's Mixture and a Fool's Stout

steps.description: Talk to Gnome Pit Boss and turn in Get the Gnomes Drunk
Talk to Kravel Koalbeard and accept Report Back to Fizzlebub
Talk to Quentin, turn in An Orphan Looking For a Home, accept A Short Incubation, and turn in A Short Incubation

quests.name: An Orphan Looking For a Home

steps.description: Talk to Wizzle Brassbolts and accept Gahz'rilla
Talk to Trenton Lighthammer and accept Troll Temper
Talk to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle and accept Divino-matic Rod
Talk to Tran'rek and accept Scarab Shells
Talk to Yeh'kinya and accept The Prophecy of Mosh'aru
You will now run Zul'Farrak. Grind on Pirates while looking for a ZF group. Enter Zul'Farrak
Kill Theka the Martyr. Loot him for the First Mosh'aru Tablet
Kill Scarabs. Loot them for their Uncracked Scarab Shell
Ascend the Pyramid. Kill the Sandfury Executioner. Loot him for the Executioner's Key.

tips.text: Anyone in the party may loot the Key
Use the Executioner's Key on one of the Troll Cages to free Sergeant Bly and his band

steps.description: Defend Sergeant Bly and his band, then move down with them after a short period of time. Kill Nekrum Gutchewer. Loot him for Nekrum's Medallion. After you kill Nekrum Gutchewer, eat and drink then talk to Sergeant Bly to fight him. Kill Sergeant Bly. Loot him for the Divino-matic Rod
Kill Hydromancer Velratha. Loot her for the Tiara of the Deep and the Second Mosh'aru Tablet
Kill Gahz'rilla. Loot him for Gahz'rilla's Electrified Scale.

tips.text: Use the Mallet of Zul'Farrak on the Gong of Zul'Farrak to summon Gahz'rilla
If no one in your party has the Mallet of Zul'Farrak you will not be able to summon Gahz'rilla

steps.description: Kill Trolls. Loot them for their Troll Temper
Hearth to Gadgetzan
Talk to Trenton Lighthammer and turn in Troll Temper
Talk to Chief Engineer Bilgewhizzle and turn in Divino-matic Rod
Talk to Tran'rek and turn in Scarab Shells
Talk to Yeh'kinya and turn in The Prophecy of Mosh'aru
Travel to the Mirage Raceway
Talk to Wizzle Brassbolts and turn in Gahz'rilla
Talk to Quentin and accept The Newest Member of the Family

quests.name: The Newest Member of the Family

steps.description: Talk to Gimblethorn. Withdraw Super Snapper FX from your bank
Talk to Gimblethorn. Deposit Fool's Stout Report into your bank
Talk to Bera Stonehammer and fly to Theramore
Talk to Innkeeper Janene. Set your Hearthstone to Theramore
Swim to the hill west
Open the Damaged Crate. Loot it for the Overdue Package
Talk to Tabetha and turn in Tiara of the Deep
Click the Musty Scroll on the rock, turn in Cortello's Riddle, and accept Cortello's Riddle
Travel to Theramore Isle
Take the boat to Menethil Harbor
Talk to Shellei Brondir and fly to Hinterlands
Talk to Fraggar Thundermantle and accept Skulk Rock Clean-up
Talk to Innkeeper Thulfram. Set Hearthstone to Aerie Peak. Innkeeper Thulfram patrols upstairs

tips.text: Innkeeper Thulfram patrols upstairs

steps.description: Talk to Agnar Beastamer, turn in The Newest Member of the Family, and accept Food for Baby.

tips.text: Agnar Beastamer is downstairs in the Keep

quests.name: The Newest Member of the Family

steps.description: Travel to Agol'watha
Kill Green Sludges and Jade Oozes
Kill Silvermane Stalkers. Loot them for their Flanks.

tips.text: The Silvermane Stalkers are in Stealth

steps.description: Kill Vilebranch Trolls. Loot them for the OOX-09/HL Distress Beacon.

tips.text: Use the OOX-09/HL Distress Beacon to start the quest
If you are unlucky and don't find it after some time, skip this step. However, it is recommended you farm until you find it

steps.description: Talk to the Homing Robot OOX-09/HL and turn in Find OOX-09/HL!.

tips.text: Do NOT accept the follow up and attempt to do the Escort, unless you are in a group

steps.description: Talk to the Homing Robot OOX-09/HL and accept Rescue OOX-09/HL!
Escort the Homing Robot OOX-09/HL to safety
Loot the Pupellyverbos Ports on the ground
Use the Super Snapper FX on Gammerita.

tips.text: This will cause Gammerita to agro you. Be ready to run away after using it

steps.description: Click on Cortello's Treasure underwater
Hearth to Aerie Peak. Grind until your Hearthstone is off cooldown

tips.text: Grind until your Hearthstone is off cooldown

steps.description: Talk to Agnar Beastamer, turn in Food for Baby, accept Becoming a Parent, and turn in Becoming a Parent. Agnar Beastamer is downstairs in the Keep

tips.text: Agnar Beastamer is downstairs in the Keep

steps.description: Talk to Fraggar Thundermantle and turn in Skulk Rock Clean-up
Talk to Guthrum Thunderfist and fly to Wetlands
Talk to Innkeeper Helbrek. Set your Hearthstone to Wetlands
Talk to Shellei Brondir and fly to Ironforge
Talk to Bailey Stonemantle. Deposit Pupellyverbos Port, Super Snapper FX, Snapshot of Gammerita, and Overdue Package into your bank
Talk to Bailey Stonemantle. Withdraw Singed Letter (If you have it) from your bank
Talk to Curator Thorius, turn in Suntara Stones, and accept Dwarven Justice. Curator Thorius patrols through the Hall of Explorers

tips.text: Curator Thorius patrols through the Hall of Explorers

steps.description: Talk to Gryth Thurden and fly to Searing Gorge
